sentences.en: Theophrastus's "Characters, " written in the fourth century B. C. , paints a portrait of a hairy, scabby sloven named Nastiness, who doesn't wash his hands after dinner.
sentences.cn: 泰奥弗拉斯托斯在公元前十四世纪所著《品格论》中，描述了一个浑身毛茸茸的长满疥癣的懒散人，名叫污秽，此人饭后从不洗手。

sentences.en: Those who an experiment studied 184 pass 60 years old is healthy but life sloven .
sentences.cn: 有一项实验研究了184名年过60岁的身体健康但生活懒散的人。

words.tran_cn: 懒散的；不整洁的；马虎的
邋遢地；马虎地；不整洁地
懒散的人；不修边幅的人

trans.tran_cn: 不修边幅的/地，不整洁的/地，懒散的/地，草率的/地

trans.tran_en: a person who is habitually negligent in appearance, hygiene, or work
